* Contact: JoelStanley
* Brand: LG Electronics
* Model: LW40 Express (LW40-BTZA)

=== Current Issues ===
* Does not power off after shutdown.
* Does not sucessfuly resume after Hibernation.
* Sound comes out of internal speakers, as well as headphones, while headphones are plugged in
